name: Agent no. 6
description:
Overview

Agent no. 6 is a first person shooter straight from the 90's that combines horror with action.  

As a secret agent it is your job to infiltrate the base of a terrorist group using a different arsenal of weapons. The game however takes a quick turn when things aren't what they suppose to be.  

Assets

All the assets are uncopyrighted and can be downloaded via: https://github.com/jaimejaimek/Agent6.git
